amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for military construction for the Navy by $16.4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in the Congressional Record of June 15, to reduce the funds authorized in the bill for Navy Military Construction by $16.4 million. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate the $10 million appropriation for a physical fitness center in Washington State and to reduce funding for renovation of a foundry in Philadelphia by $6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 270 (Roll no. 394).
